Develop a coffee maker that uses biodegradable and compostable materials for the coffee pods and cartridges.
Create a coffee maker that uses a smartphone app to control and monitor the brewing process, including temperature, brew time, and strength.
Develop a coffee maker that uses a built-in grinder to grind the coffee beans on-demand, ensuring the freshest possible cup of coffee.
